16.ara-name: كتاب الديات عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn Mas'ud:"The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) judged for the accidental blood-Money: Twenty Bint Makhad, twenty make Ibn Makhad, twenty Bint Labunm twenty Jadha'ah, and twenty Hiqqah. (Another chain) with similar meaning

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الدِّيَةِ كَمْ هِيَ مِنَ الإِبِلِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Blood Money, How Many Camels Is It?
